thread.title: Twitter's Dorsey says to give a third of his stock to employee equity pool
thread.title_full: Twitter's Dorsey says to give a third of his stock to employee equity pool

title: Twitter's Dorsey says to give a third of his stock to employee equity pool
text:
Related: Tech Twitter's Dorsey says to give a third of his stock to employee equity pool Jack Dorsey goes for a walk on the first day of the annual Allen and Co. media conference in Sun Valley, Idaho July 8, 2015. Reuters/Mike Blake 
Twitter Inc Chief Executive Jack Dorsey said he is giving a third of his stock in the company, about 1 percent, to the employee equity pool. 
This move is to "reinvest directly in our people," Dorsey, who was named as the company's permanent CEO earlier this month, said in a tweet on Thursday. 
Twitter could not be reached immediately for a comment outside regular business hours. 
(Reporting by Rishika Sadam in Bengaluru; Editing by Leslie Adler)
